entry.title: HOMEMADE HEMP MILK 🥛🤍 just 3 ingredients, super easy to make and no unnecessary additives you can’t pronounce 🚫 — one of my favorite milks to use for matcha making! 💚 • INGREDIENTS • 1/2 cup hemps seeds 1 tsp maple syrup (or 1 pitted date) 3.5 cups water
